rooms.name: Living Room & Dining Area
rooms.description: A large open space with exposed concrete finishes typical of Brutalist architecture. Designed to be the social hub.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom featuring concrete elements and a private balcony with northern exposure for positive Vastu energy.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Secondary bedroom integrated with natural light and ventilation.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Additional bedroom maintaining consistent design language with Brutalist concrete finishes.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Functionally designed bathroom incorporating Vastu principles for water elements.

rooms.name: Utility Room
rooms.description: Essential space for maintenance and storage of household utilities.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.description: A robust, minimalistic door aligned with the north-facing entrance as per Vastu recommendations, emphasizing strength and resilience.

openings.name: Service Entrance
openings.description: Secondary access point for service utilities.

openings.name: Exterior Windows
openings.description: Large fenestration to ensure ample natural light and air circulation while adhering to local building norms.

rooms.name: Library & Study
rooms.description: A dedicated library space with bookshelves integrated into the raw concrete walls; designed to serve as a quiet retreat for study.

rooms.name: Bedroom 4
rooms.description: Additional bedroom ensuring privacy and relaxation.

rooms.name: Bedroom 5
rooms.description: Additional bedroom designed to maintain consistency with the overall Brutalist aesthetic.

rooms.name: Bedroom 6
rooms.description: Final bedroom of the duplex design ensuring ample personal space for all residents.

rooms.name: Balcony
rooms.description: Open balcony space adjoining the master bedroom to enhance natural light and Vastu energy flow.

openings.name: Staircase
openings.description: A functional staircase connecting the ground floor and first floor with exposed concrete detailing.

openings.name: Balcony Door
openings.description: Access door to the balcony from Bedroom 4, ensuring privacy while offering scenic views.

note: This design integrates Brutalist architectural elements with Vastu principles. The North-facing entrance and open spaces have been prioritized to align with local norms and maximize energy flow. The irregular plot has been considered by flexible room dimensions and adaptable spatial planning across both levels.
